card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Propeller Mutant
card.text: ■ When this creature is destroyed, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Volcano Charger
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less. ■ Charger

card.name: Galek, the Shadow Warrior
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

card.name: Inferno Sign
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a non-evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Super Trash Train, Fuuma Devil
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Spell Great Blue, Blue Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a spell that costs 7 or less, you may cast it For No Cost ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bloody Dragoon
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature battles, destroy it after the battle.

card.name: Maxval, Electro-Fuuma
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Your darkness creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Fuuma Bajir, Soul Weapon
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When this creature is destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less or your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Crimson Mega Dragoon
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have "blocker".

card.name: Bell Hell De Dios, Death Castle Beast Lord
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Zero Phoenix, Phoenix of Darkness
card.text: ■ Vortex evolution: Put on one of your darkness creatures and one of your fire creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand. Then you may choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them into their graveyard.

card.name: Alexander the 3rd, Emperor of the Demonic Eye
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever you cast a light, water, or darkness spell from your hand or graveyard, if you have at least one other Knight in the battle zone you may search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck that has the same name as the spell you cast and cast it For No Cost

card.name: Sir Leopol Deenay, the Ice Fang
card.text: ■ Whenever you cast a spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Death Mendosa, Dragonic Baron of Death
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

card.name: Jack Valdy, the Everlasting
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's non-multicolored creatures that costs 5 or less, or put one of your opponent's non-multicolored cross gear that costs 5 or less into your opponent's graveyard. ■ Double Breaker
